## Document.publish() method

`publish` triggers an event in this document, which can be received by callback functions from document.subscribe().

**Signature:**

```typescript
publish(event: TransactionEvent<P>): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  event | [TransactionEvent](./yorkie-js-sdk.transactionevent.md)<!-- -->&lt;P&gt; |  |

**Returns:**

void
